biography_text: WATKINS, Steve, a Representative from Kansas; born Lubbock, Lubbock County, Texas, September 18, 1976; graduated from Topeka West High School, Topeka, Kans., 1995; B.S., United States Military Academy, West Point, N.Y., 1995; M.S.R.E.D., Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, Mass., 2010; M.C./M.P.A., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2017; United States Army, 1994-2004; independent contractor, United States Department of Defense; business consultant; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: United States Military Academy, West Point, N.Y.
Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, Mass.
